message: Is there a size limit for trails? Somehow I thought they would only store 32 entries.
Thanks, Loic. I was looking http://docs.kynetx.com/docs/Persistent_Variables and it didn't mention any limit.
According to this page : http://wiki.kynetx.com/pages/Expressions#Persistent_Variables trails are limited to 20 entries.

a persistent var car contain up to 1 millions characters it seems ( http://wiki.kynetx.com/pages/New_pers_var_page) so I guess if you store a JSON object you can simulate something like a trail without the 20 entries limitation
yeah, not always easy to find an info on this wiki. Still useful though.
great, then it will be the name of a new app too
Trails have been expanded beyond 20 entries to something quite large. I can get the exact number from @meh if you need.
hopping sandwich is also a great band name.
I was hoping to update the docs. Also, I need to start filtering (if not seen 'x' within 4 hours).
Well, I dunno about you, but I'm not always hopping for something. That would be too much exersice
Do you know what I'm hoping for right now? A delicious sandwich
Got another instant of profound serendipity for a kynetx app thanks to your hopping sandwiches. I thank you all.
